channel.title: CVE Feed for Prosys OPC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Prosys OPC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2967|2024-08-03T00:53:00.627Z -- prosys%20opc -- ua%20simulation%20server
item.description: Prosys OPC UA Simulation Server version prior to v5.3.0-64 and UA Modbus Server versions 1.4.18-5 and prior do not sufficiently protect credentials, which could allow an attacker to obtain user credentials and gain access to system data.
